languages.text: {n}Сваленные в кучу безжизненные тела встречают вас у входа во дворец. Мертвецы в форме дворцовой стражи лежат рядом с несколькими другими — одетыми в наряды, похожие на те, что обычно носит знать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Сваленные в кучу безжизненные тела встречают вас у входа во дворец. Мертвецы в форме дворцовой стражи лежат рядом с несколькими другими — одетыми в наряды, похожие на те, что обычно носит знать, но на вид куда более дешевые. Кажется, совсем недавно здесь произошло сражение.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You are confronted by the sight of dead bodies at the entrance to the palace. The corpses have been hauled into a pile — some are dressed in the uniforms of palace wardens, while others are arrayed in the clothing typical of the Dargonus nobility.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сваленные в кучу безжизненные тела встречают вас у входа во дворец. Мертвецы в форме дворцовой стражи лежат рядом с несколькими другими — одетыми в наряды, похожие на те, что обычно носит знать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The piled up dead bodies welcome you to the palace. The corpses dressed as the palace guards lay near several others — dressed similarly to the aristocrats.{/n}
{n}The piled up dead bodies welcome you to the palace. The corpses dressed as the palace guards lay near several others — dressed similarly to the aristocrats.{/n}
{n}The pile of dead bodies welcomes you to the palace. The corpses dressed as the palace guards lay near several others, outfitted similarly to the aristocrats.{/n}
{n}The pile of dead bodies welcomes you to the palace. The corpses dressed as the palace guards lay near several others, outfitted similarly to the aristocrats.{/n}

{n}You are confronted by the sight of dead bodies at the entrance to the palace. The corpses have been hauled into a pile — some are dressed in the uniforms of palace wardens, while others are arrayed in the clothing typical of the Dargonus nobility.{/n}

{n}You are confronted by the sight of dead bodies at the entrance to the palace. The corpses have been hauled into a pile — some are dressed in the uniforms of palace wardens, while others are arrayed in the clothing typical of the Dargonus nobility.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは宮殿の入り口で死体を目の当たりにした。死体は山のように積まれていた。ある者は宮殿のワーデンの制服を着ており、またある者はダルゴナス貴族がよく身に着けている服装をしていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are confronted by the sight of dead bodies at the entrance to the palace. The corpses have been hauled into a pile — some are dressed in the uniforms of palace wardens, while others are arrayed in the clothing typical of the Dargonus nobility.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは宮殿の入り口で死体を目の当たりにした。死体は山のように積まれていた。ある者は宮殿のワーデンの制服を着ており、またある者はダルゴナス貴族がよく身に着けている服装をしていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}映入你眼帘的，是宫殿门口一堆小山似的尸体。其中有人穿着宫廷卫兵的服饰，另外几人则穿着达戈努斯贵族的典型着装。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are confronted by the sight of dead bodies at the entrance to the palace. The corpses have been hauled into a pile — some are dressed in the uniforms of palace wardens, while others are arrayed in the clothing typical of the Dargonus nobility.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}映入你眼帘的，是宫殿门口一堆小山似的尸体。其中有人穿着宫廷卫兵的服饰，另外几人则穿着达戈努斯贵族的典型着装。{/n}

languages.text: {n}À l'entrée du palais, vous découvrez un monceau de cadavres. Empilés les uns sur les autres, certains sont vêtus de l'uniforme des gardiens, alors que d'autres portent des tenues typiques de la noblesse dargonienne.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are confronted by the sight of dead bodies at the entrance to the palace. The corpses have been hauled into a pile — some are dressed in the uniforms of palace wardens, while others are arrayed in the clothing typical of the Dargonus nobility.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À l'entrée du palais, vous découvrez un monceau de cadavres. Empilés les uns sur les autres, certains sont vêtus de l'uniforme des gardiens, alors que d'autres portent des tenues typiques de la noblesse dargonienne.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al llegar a la entrada de tu palacio, te recibe un montón de cadáveres apilados. Unos están vestidos con el uniforme de la guardia de palacio, mientras que otros llevan las prendas típicas de la nobleza de Dargonus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are confronted by the sight of dead bodies at the entrance to the palace. The corpses have been hauled into a pile — some are dressed in the uniforms of palace wardens, while others are arrayed in the clothing typical of the Dargonus nobility.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al llegar a la entrada de tu palacio, te recibe un montón de cadáveres apilados. Unos están vestidos con el uniforme de la guardia de palacio, mientras que otros llevan las prendas típicas de la nobleza de Dargonus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du wirst mit dem Anblick toter Leiber vor den Toren des Palastes konfrontiert. Die Leichen wurden zu einem Haufen gestapelt ... einige von ihnen tragen die Uniformen von Palastwachen, andere die typischen Gewänder der Adeligen auf Dargonus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are confronted by the sight of dead bodies at the entrance to the palace. The corpses have been hauled into a pile — some are dressed in the uniforms of palace wardens, while others are arrayed in the clothing typical of the Dargonus nobility.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Leichenhaufen heißt dich im Palast willkommen. Die als Palastwachen gekleideten Leichen liegen in der Nähe mehrerer anderer, deren Kleidung eher der von Aristokraten entspricht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sarayın girişinde cansız bedenlerle karşılaşıyorsun. Cesetler bir yığın hâlinde toplanmış. Bazıları saray dizdarlarının üniformalarını, diğerleriyse Dargonus soylularının gündelik kıyafetlerini kuşanmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are confronted by the sight of dead bodies at the entrance to the palace. The corpses have been hauled into a pile — some are dressed in the uniforms of palace wardens, while others are arrayed in the clothing typical of the Dargonus nobility.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sarayın girişinde cansız bedenlerle karşılaşıyorsun. Cesetler bir yığın hâlinde toplanmış. Bazıları saray dizdarlarının üniformalarını, diğerleriyse Dargonus soylularının gündelik kıyafetlerini kuşanmış.{/n}
